Summary: saw the UFO hovering in the sky and then ascend veritcally
divs: Sighting DetailsThis even was witnessed by two people that I know of. First witness reported that he observed 5 UFO's that were hovering in the sky and then took off vertically. The witness heard all the dogs barking in the neighborhood and went outside and looked up and saw an object(light) hovering in the sky and then take off so fast he couldn't tell where it had gone. No noises were heard during both events.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Valparaiso
There were no other sightings in Valparaiso on or around March 29th 2013
